message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.DC. 

The paper deals with the problem of sensor selection in a linear measurement model, which is a common problem in information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY). The use of convex optimization methods is also a common theme in machine learning (cs.LG) and mathematical optimization (cs.MA). Finally, the problem of distributed decision-making is relevant to distributed computing (cs.DC).
